snippet.title: War Chess - PlayStation 2 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Developed by Artificial Mind & Movement (AKA Behavior Interactive, of Dead by Daylight fame), War Chess was XS Games' attempt at a Battle Chess clone, but this time in full 3D. In fact, War Chess pre-dates Battle Chess: Game of Kings on Steam, which was published by Interplay themselves in 2014.

The game was released back in 2003 as a PAL exclusive PlayStation 2 game. There were plans to bring it to the US, but those plans were scrapped. War Chess did manage to get a PC port a year later as a BigFish Games exclusive, but it's no longer available to purchase from that site.

#ps2 #playstation2 #retrogame #retrogames #retrogaming #warchess #chess #xsgames
